short_summary: Notice of proposed procurement (NPP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)
description: The Internal Audit and Enterprise Risk Management Branch (IAERMB) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires specific skill and knowledge with respect to IT Security to assess whether appropriate departmental IT security mechanisms are in place and working properly. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 100022520 dated November 24, 2023 with a closing of January 19, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST.
tags: Phone: ContactNC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.gc & call, 01 286446- (Monday to Friday , 08:00 AM and 04:00 PM EDT)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

#### Notice Information

* **Notice Reference:** cb-272-78626761
* **Publication Date:** February 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

#### Background

The Internal Audit and Enterprise Risk Management Branch (IAERMB) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking certified professionals in the field of IT Security to assess and ensure the effectiveness of departmental IT security mechanisms.

#### Requirement

Three (3) positions are required:

* Three (3) Information Technology Security Engineer – Level 3 (ESDC-IAERMB-06-R0014)
* Three (3) Information Technology Security Vulnerability Analysis Specialist – Level 3 (ESDC-IAERMB-11-R0015)

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is available to bidders under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CTPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

#### Procurement Method

This procurement is a competitive, selective tendering process.

#### Assessment Criteria

The tender will be assessed on a combined rating of Technical Merit and Price.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Maxime Dubé
* **Email:** NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (000) 000-0000
* **Address:** 140 Promenade du portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0J9

#### Additional Information

The tender package can be accessed at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32883/100022520a-tbips-npp-en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32883/100022520a-tbips-npp-fr.pdf (French)

Please note: The original tender was previously advertised in 2023 but has been superseded by this tender. Bidders are only eligible to submit
